basics.name: Sean Cuevo
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary: I am a man of many hats. In no particular order, I am a teacher, a freelance writer, an entrepreneur, a web developer, and technically an accountant. I also like the Oxford comma, though I have been told to stop. I work primarily on the Salesforce platform, but I am eager to learn about all aspects of programming in an effort to develop tools and products that make people's lives easier and more productive.

work.summary: Prologis is the leading owner, operator and developer of industrial real estate, focused on global and regional markets across the Americas, Europe and Asia.
highlights: Led the development of new Salesforce features to facilitate the lease analysis and approval process
Developed and managed internal version control process
Helped create integrations with other systems in the Prologis ecosystem

work.summary: Apto is a Commercial Real Estate CRM built on the Salesforce platform
highlights: Architected and implemented features including third party listing service integrations, wizards, and commission calculation
Managed deployments for major releases and patches
Led code review and outlined best practices for the code base

work.summary: Bluewolf provides strategic consulting, implementation, training and cloud innovation services, focused primarily on the Salesforce platform
highlights: Designed, scoped, and implemented agile solutions on the Saleforce platform using TDD
Held daily scrums to update clients on project progress
Led internal discussions/book club on best practices, new technologies and career development

work.summary: ventureangel seeks to improve the way that entrepreneurs connect with investors by providing an easy to use UI for building presentations and searching through proposals
highlights: Maintained the back-end of the website using Ruby on Rails
Managed accounting books and in charge of legal compliance with State and Federal Regulations

work.summary: Professional tutoring services for high school and colllege students focused primarily on standardized testing preparation.
highlights: Tutored high school students individually and in groups of 5 to 20 students in SAT test taking skills and strategies
Documented student improvement and coordinated with studentsâ€™ parents to develop programs catered to different learning styles

work.company: USDA, Grain Inspection, Packers and Stockyards Administration
work.summary: The U.S. Department of Agriculture's agency that facilitates the marketing of livestock, poultry, meat, cereals, oilseeds, and related agricultural products, and promotes fair and competitive trading practices for the overall benefit of consumers and American agriculture.
highlights: Conducted investigations of entities under the jurisdiction of the Packers and Stockyard Act
Audited financial records to determine compliance of custodial accounts, financial solvency, and timely payment
